BATES CardConnect0052946
Shift4 Payments
2025 Goals
Vision Statement
To be the global leader in commerce-enabling technology.
Primary Coals
1. Increase the value of the company to $50+ Billion
2. Donate $1+ Billion to non-profit causes

Key Initiatives for Success
•	Significantly expand our reach within existing verticals
•	Penetrate new market verticals where we can win >25% market share
•	Deliver our mission-critical solutions to a global audience
•	Expand our solutions beyond payments to eliminate merchant pain points
•	Use data intelligence to deliver a better commerce experience
•	Establish ourselves as leaders in new/relevant technologies (i.e. crypto)
•	Drive industry consolidation through large, accretive acquisitions
•	Leverage our growing scale to renegotiate terms throughout the value chain
•	Become the most sought-after place to work
•	Build the best leadership team in our industry
•	Create a world-class approach to talent and culture

Strategic Priorities for Shift4
•	Deliver the best solutions/support
•	Maintain best-in-class uptime and reliability
•	Move more services in-house and closer to the customer
•	Integrate software and service to create a seamless customer experience
•	Utilize automation to reduce costs
•	Increase monetization of existing customers
•	Build a more direct relationship with merchants, globally
•	Control intellectual property without stifling innovation
•	Expand our addressable market
•	Invest and scale our product and engineering teams
•	Expand our sales and marketing capabilities
•	Focus on sales effectiveness
•	Maintain a best-in-class cost structure
•	Leverage acquisitions to consolidate the industry, gain share and build a competitive moat

CONFIDENTIAL
CardConnect0052946
```

BATES CardConnect0052947
2025 Goals

```
BATES CardConnect0052948
Addendum I
Primary Goal: Increase the value of the company to $50+ Billion
Assumptions
•	Addressable Market Size: Assume $50T+ in addressable volume.
•	Market Share: 1.5% market penetration equals $750B in annual payment volume.
•	Volume Growth: Volume will grow as we add more solutions beyond payments, establish global footprint,
and close strategic acquisitions.
•	Take Rate: Assume 25 basis points (excluding interchange and network fees)
•	Revenue Growth Driver: Revenue will grow as we deliver more solutions and drive more payment volume
•	Annual Revenue: $1.875 Billion
Valuation
•	Revenue Multiplier: 26-27x annual revenue
•	Target Company Value: $50 Billion
Success Measures
•	eCommerce Growth
•	Software Partner Signings and Conversions
•	Average Merchant Size
•	Merchant Count
•	End-to-End Volume and Revenue Trend
•	Revenue Per Employee
•	Annual Recurring Revenue
•	Cost of Goods Sold Trend
•	Net Revenue Retention
•	Total Addressable Market (TAM)
Required Resources
•	Top-tier management team
•	Best place to work and best sales culture
•	High performing sales, operations and support teams
•	Investments in technology, development and innovation.
•	Disciplined approach to organic and inorganic growth (i.e. M&A)
•	Strong balance sheet to support strategic acquisitions
CONFIDENTIAL
CardConnect0052948
```
```
BATES CardConnect0052949
Addendum II
Primary Goal: Donate $1+ Billion
Assumptions
•	Pledge 1% of all revenue
•	For every $1 in revenue generated, 1% will be donated to various charities
•	Pledge 1% of all equity awards
•	For all annual equity grants, 1% will be granted to non-profit
•	Pledge 1% of annual profits
•	For every $1 of profit, donate .01 to various non-profit beneficiaries
•	For every new employee, we will donate $100 to a non-profit.
•	For every new end-to-end customer, we will donate $100 to a non-profit
•	Additional donations
•	All employee matching donations.
•	All customer matching donations.
•	All executive contributions.
Success Measures
•	Annual Giving
•	Total Giving
•	Total Number of Charities Supported
•	Total Donations
•	Annual Giving as a % of Revenue
•	Annual Giving as a % of Equity
•	Annual Giving as a % of Profit
•	Total Employee Matches
•	Total Customer Matches
Required Resources
•	Create non-profit entity to manage distributions (similar to pledge1percent.org)
•	Define mission statement, values, and goals of foundation.
•	Establish board to approve initiatives.
CONFIDENTIAL
CardConnect0052949
